name: flickr.photosets.getPhotos
description: Get the list of photos in a set.
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: photoset_id
arguments.description: The id of the photoset to return the photos for.

arguments.name: user_id
arguments.description: The user_id here is the owner of the set passed in photoset_id.

arguments.name: extras
arguments.description: A comma-delimited list of extra information to fetch for each returned record. Currently supported fields are: license, date_upload, date_taken, owner_name, icon_server, original_format, last_update, geo, tags, machine_tags, o_dims, views, media, path_alias, url_sq, url_t, url_s, url_m, url_o

arguments.name: per_page
arguments.description: Number of photos to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 500. The maximum allowed value is 500.

arguments.name: page
arguments.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.

arguments.name: privacy_filter
arguments.description: Return photos only matching a certain privacy level. This only applies when making an authenticated call to view a photoset you own. Valid values are:1 public photos2 private photos visible to friends3 private photos visible to family4 private photos visible to friends & family5 completely private photos

arguments.name: media
arguments.description: Filter results by media type. Possible values areall(default),photosorvideos

response:
<photoset id="4" primary="2483" page="1" perpage="500" pages="1" total="2">
  <photo id="2484" secret="123456" server="1" title="my photo" isprimary="0" />
  <photo id="2483" secret="123456" server="1" title="flickr rocks" isprimary="1" />
</photoset>

errors.title: Photoset not foundThe photoset id passed was not a valid photoset id.
Invalid API KeyThe API key passed was not valid or has expired.

Method "xxx" not foundThe requested method was not found.

Invalid XML-RPC Method CallThe XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
Bad URL foundOne or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
